sourcesContent:
<template>
    <VueDatePicker v-model="date" :format="formatDate(date)">

    </VueDatePicker>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            date: Date
        }
    },
    methods: {
        formatDate(datetime) {
            const day = datetime.getDate();
            const month = datetime.getMonth() + 1;
            const year = datetime.getFullYear();

            return `Selected date is ${day}/${month}/${year}`;
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
@import url('../../style/base/textfield.css');
</style>
